# Using the Kmeans to gain better performance in the models.

In order to use this technique the data must be subset to only the numerical predictors

```{r}
# read in data
titanic_training_set <- read.csv('../input/train.csv')
# read in test data 
test_dat <- read.csv("../input/test.csv")
```



# subset data to only numeric variables
training_set <- subset(titanic_training_set, select = c(Age,SibSp,Parch,Fare))
holdout_set <- subset(titanic_holdout_set, select = c(Age,SibSp,Parch,Fare))
test_set <- subset(test_dat, select = c(Age,SibSp,Parch,Fare))
# use summary to check for any NA's or other potential problems
summary(training_set)
```
